column5:
10, 2023 predictions by Dr. Richard Haass, veteran diplomat and prominent voice on foreign policy. Here he covers Ukraine, the economy, and more. He notes that Japan emerges as a forward-leaning political and military power. #2023trends 
https://t.co/D2yJdtu5gM

As you know I look at a wide swath of information. The Economist talks ten trends to watch for in 2023, a POV I may not agree with. But it kick starts our thinking and conversation. Article: https://t.co/qqPbu35YMT News interview: https://t.co/DB4PShwXzN #2023trends

Gary Quinn has released a fantastic new book: BECOME YOUR OWN BUSINESS GURU which has a set of inspiration cards you can purchase as well. Brilliant. Shown here-Gary recording the book!  #INSPIRATION   https://t.co/8OAm1sHChM https://t.co/t4MkS3lTB8

Don't miss my Instagram 100Trends/100Days found @JodyTurner... I am up to number 70! Have some fun, take a look and flip through, some interesting things from many different perspectives. #trending #trends2022 #trendingnow https://t.co/ee9X7N1Ea0
INCLUSION: A quick but great read about language! Educational, timely, trending. https://t.co/evAMQLUbfh #inclusion #language https://t.co/ktjqCSzyC6

Thank you Cole Baker-Bagwell and the Kindness Think Tank podcast for having me on a while back! Great questions and considerations about kindness and the future. "Bold Ideas Shattering Glass Ceilings." Enjoy! https://t.co/MctHvVveVR  #kindness   #futuresthinking
Join me on Instagram @JodyTurner for 100Trends100Days – the hottest, that latest, the inspirational and most meaningful. #TrendingNow https://t.co/YaS7gNjEoG

Great new designing the future book by @jmskibsted  “EXPANDING THE FUTURE BY DESIGN is an eye-opener stetching our thinking about innovation and how we meet global challenges in an increasingly complex world." -Founder of Fast Company #innovation https://t.co/RSedAkfBpO

Great music trend, Coachella and Spotify Live! Kickoff to Coachella was Swedish House Mafia. And the first-ever live-streaming event on Spotify. Fans were able to tune in on Spotify and via the band's page. 
-Scandinavian Mind #music https://t.co/JBIoYHP6Bg
@alloysiusattah, super proud of you and where you have taken Farmerline! I remember the beginning of it all back in Accra! Way to go! https://t.co/iRySvPA7MP

Talented, sustainable design associate Jens Martin Skibsted has released his latest book, EXPAND-STRETCHING THE FUTURE with Christian Bason, CEO of the Danish Design Center, Copenhagen: https://t.co/kYGkquuYDJ
Collaboration is key. #innovation https://t.co/oAvPPGZPlu

100Trends/100Days! Join me on Instagram 
@JodyTurner for some fun and seriously good insight. I have so many it may turn into 1000 days! Stay tuned. #trending #instagram https://t.co/g1eA0zHLOB

Buildings that move? In the past I discussed cloaking design options embedded in materials that change, designing to wind through shape for flow, and new materials that protect-Jacquelyn Denaali updated it all with brilliant detail and much more. https://t.co/QM5w4BEi9k #future
Truly great rant @billmaher from Real Time With Bill Maher, HBO, on KARMA. SUPER NOVA BRILLIANT! https://t.co/csafne5j1o
People first is always a good approach and will help us get through what we need to get through during these times. Good article HBR. #humanconnection    https://t.co/NWpkSTZKUh
The pink dolphin of Brazil is unique and beautiful. Fishermen and scientists team up to save them.  #animals  https://t.co/yDzykUdQGo
Yes, the UK is recognizing some invertebrates as intelligent beings. Amazing developments in the world today. #animalwelfare https://t.co/tys2MfbqMW

“Climate change is forcing farmers and agricultural entrepreneurs to adapt and embrace new crops that would have been impossible for them to grow even 10 years ago. New terroirs could forever change the way we think of the heritage and provenance of food.” https://t.co/8NMXPUyrss https://t.co/TjvdsnBmEG

https://t.co/WzoSwO44HQ

Great book list for 2022, IDEO style. https://t.co/Pu4bT3Z5hJ  #creativityskills
Focusing on turning anthropology beyond the human on our planet: HOW FORESTS THINK... Lovely holiday gift from a friend and it looks GOOD! https://t.co/GkxN1dMU5N    #forests

Purpose or mission is important for companies, for people, families... at large. It helps us remember why we do, and have been doing, what we do. It keeps us on... purpose. #focus #purpose
https://t.co/LdDip4BmaU https://t.co/cwZKTIdKgm

https://t.co/H7VQYqkwuU
Here is to true innovation, amazing beauty and crazy-good inspiration! https://t.co/i0ZxIN340F #innovation

I love my job. Just spoke with smart techie and conference leader in Moscow on video. Been speaking in different places 20 years?  Grateful for this varied work and the comfortability of working remotely... something I've also done for so long. Global workers, a must. #grateful https://t.co/oAToA5IT5G
I absolutely love working with this anthropologist/ethnographer. Genius. https://t.co/88j3lly5Bu #innovative #ethnographer https://t.co/yGERz3izCC

Sharing on December 7th, 16:30-17:30 Moscow time, streaming for Nobel Vision Open Innovations 2.0 Forum (https://t.co/vb7bm1Ws5B). Panel led by Anton Pronin Innovation Director Skolkovo Foundation, discussing Design-Led Strategy/Thinking.  #design #innovation #strategy https://t.co/vESSDg5y3Q

Veterans Day. Honoring my Dad today as an Army vet WWII, along with my incredible nephews who served ... bronze star, purple heart... happy they are home. And my Mom's people who have a long history of serving honorably, The Chata Native American. #gratitudepost #VeteransDay

One of the most amazing innovators, Philipp Kauffmann's @original beans… futurist and leader in regeneration. From Philipp: “For 10 years, consuming one gram of Original Beans chocolate has taken two to three grams of CO2 out of the atmosphere.” https://t.co/Ul2Zq7sTTT

Honored to present design thinking at Nobel Vision/Open Innovation  Moscow, Russia. Wish I could join in person this time around, perhaps next year! The lineup looks great-nexttech, digital, pandemic thinking. https://t.co/vb7bm1Ws5B #digital #designthinking #innovation https://t.co/2tVh8jxvTT

In the process of interviewing a leader in nature-blending and community-building architecture. Jeanne Gang is a genius designer, studio leader and founder, a Harvard professor, and MacArthur fellow who cares a great deal about our world. Stay tuned.
https://t.co/vnfHSqjRrT https://t.co/lvu6ts4kwV

Attending this incredible conference on urban innovation end of month... brilliant speakers!!! Let's figure out what is happening in the world and design to solve and contribute... https://t.co/0NacYatydE @diannacarmel @Resonanceco #innovationsummit https://t.co/J1GzHl4B5c

Attending an interesting global reinvention event thanks to brilliant associates @diannacarmel Carr and @bizadams ... well worth a check out as we redesign how we live... https://t.co/ssFy0v0cTs

Thank you Yuan Tsai, great color stories! I track color trends by linking human behavior to the emotions of color – this does just that, brilliantly. Pure emotions from our covid era. https://t.co/kpaqcCLZ1B https://t.co/8bOSb03PB0

In an illuminating conversation brilliant social media expert explains what builds binary politics and rage most effectively within the context of social media. From co-founder of The Center for Humane Technology @tristanharris. #thoughtleader https://t.co/vyd2oqYpNe

Wow Ogojiii, a pro-bono, community-driven innovation and design media platform with an Africa focus. Great news and information about innovative diversity. Thank you for the tip, Jens Martin Skibsted. #innovation #diversity https://t.co/Ul2naYZkJZ https://t.co/9SmTQEL2SO
Innovative artist turns the sea floor across the globe into a human cultural story while safely building back the coral reefs. https://t.co/3MAfbC9gUQ #artinnovation

Speaking on #INNOVATION next month, focusing on the importance of diverse thinking within innovation practices for companies and organizations. Excited about this opportunity to share the latest. https://t.co/0QJOnIzQzA https://t.co/pqCYq0wcry

A design influencer extraordinaire, Yves Behar has a new book out that covers his hefty work in DESIGNING IDEAS. His work is across industry and highly influential. Enjoy this journey! #designinginfluence #innovativethinking https://t.co/H4eqGx7xm7 https://t.co/ZHh6Whdsgn

Thoughts on podcasts, diverse generations, and never trusting anyone over 30. Comedy does get us through. The wisdom and brilliance of Bill Maher, Steve Martin, Martin Short. https://t.co/P48OFj6HfT https://t.co/qSW2xyxwA4

I have loved singing and playing music by Nancy Griffith throughout my life, I will miss her presence on earth. A tribute by The Kennedys at 11 am west coast/2 pm east coast time today....fare thee well Nancy. https://t.co/iRFlagkJI3

Way to go @SeaMeetsSkye, Skye Morét! After years of global travel you are still the most dynamic woman I have EVER met. Continually delivering AMAZING AND MUCH NEEDED contributions. Thank you. #innovationleadership #meaningfulconnections

This fall I will be presenting at a Dyslexia & Innovation Symposium on the importance of neurodiversity of many kinds for dynamic breakthroughs in innovation. As always, excited about what moves the innovation needle upward and onward. Stay turned.  #innovation https://t.co/w9k5t5pWwi
